file_summary: This Java class, `PetTypeFormatter`, is a Spring `@Component` that implements the `org.springframework.format.Formatter` interface for the `PetType` object. Its primary purpose is to instruct Spring MVC on how to convert a `PetType` object to its String representation (for display) and, more importantly, how to parse a String back into a `PetType` object (for data binding in forms or request parameters). It leverages the `PetTypeRepository` to fetch `PetType` instances based on their name when parsing. This class simplifies data handling for `PetType` in Spring-based web applications, ensuring correct type conversion and validation.
